name: When Legends Work Together Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Spencer Tracy and Clark Gable worked together in "Boom Town". Both were interested in the same woman. Who was she?
questions.explanation:
Claudette Colbert.

	This was an enjoyable movie with two top stars. (Gable got the girl.) Heddy Lamarr was also in the cast. (Tracy and Gable also teamed in "San Francisco".)

questions.text: Paul Newman and Edward G. Robinson starred in "The Prize". Which statement is true?
questions.explanation:
Both were prize winners.

	Both were winners of "The Prize". Newman ends up investigating some "curious" items involving Robinson in this entertaining adaptation of the novel that put Irving Wallace on the map.

questions.text: Charlton Heston and Orson Welles starred in "Touch of Evil". Who played Heston's wife?
questions.explanation:
Janet Leigh.

	Many people claim that this is a top movie, but I've never been impressed by it. (Look for Dennis Weaver in a small role.)

questions.text: Which movie starred James Cagney and Humphrey Bogart?
questions.explanation:
Roaring Twenties.

	Both played tough guys. Bogart did "Circus" (with June Allyson), Cagney did "Heat" (with Virginia Mayo), and "13" (with a great ending).

questions.text: Marlon Brando and Montgomery Clift starred in "The Young Lions". Which statement is true?
questions.correct: Brando played a German soldier; Clift played an American G.I.
options: Clift played a German soldier, Brando played an American G.I.
questions.explanation:
Brando played a German soldier; Clift played an American G.I.

	This was a good World War II movie, based on the novel by Irwin Shaw.

questions.text: Who is NOT in "Requiem for a Heavyweight"?
questions.explanation:
Anne Baxter.

	Jackie Gleason rounds out a fine cast in this good Rod Serling story.

questions.text: Which actor was NOT in "Young Man With A Horn"?
questions.explanation:
James Stewart.

	Kirk plays musician Bix Beiderbecke. Day and Bacall play the women in his life.

questions.text: Frank Sinatra and Natalie Wood starred in what movie?
questions.explanation:
Kings Go Forth.

	Nice guy Sinatra falls for Wood, but she falls for Tony Curtis (who plays a louse). Sinatra starred with Doris Day in "Heart". Wood starred in "Marjorie" and "Daisy".

questions.text: Bette Davis and Henry Fonda starred in what movie?
questions.explanation:
Jezebel.

	Fonda starred with Davis in this one. The others are all early Bette Davis starring roles.

questions.text: Julie Andrews and Robert Preston and James Garner worked together in "Victor, Victoria". Which statement is true (as to their characters in the movie)?
questions.correct: Preston is gay, but Andrews and Garner are not
options: Andrews is gay, but Preston and Garner are not
Garner is gay, but Preston and Andrews are not
questions.explanation:
Preston is gay, but Andrews and Garner are not.

	Of the three, Preston is the only gay one in this funny and enjoyable movie.
